# catalystcenter_buildings (Data Source)

This data source can read the Buildings.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "catalystcenter_buildings" "example" {
  id = "76d24097-41c4-4558-a4d0-a8c07ac08470"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The id of the object

### Read-Only

- `buildings` (Attributes Set) List of buildings (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--buildings))

<a id="nestedatt--buildings"></a>
### Nested Schema for `buildings`

Read-Only:

- `address` (String) The address of the building
- `country` (String) The country of the building
- `id` (String) The id of the building
- `latitude` (Number) Latitude
- `longitude` (Number) Longitude
- `name` (String) The name of the building
- `parent_id` (String) The parent ID of the building
- `parent_name_hierarchy` (String) Parent hierarchical name (e.g., Global/USA/San Jose)
